Title: Anasuya
Writer: Ravi Babu (story), Nivas (dialogue), Gopalakrishna Paruchuri (screenplay), Venkateswara Rao Paruchuri (screenplay)
Actors: Bhoomika Chawla, Ravi Babu, Abbas, Ankita
Plot: A spine-chilling suspense thriller about a cat and mouse game between a budding journalist and motivated serial killer.
